beluga_wonder_box_activate_message: 當時間倒數至0時，記得將寶可夢傳送至Pokémon HOME或Nintendo Switch，這樣就能啟動神秘盒子喔！
catch_xp_increase_cuve_throw: 投出曲球時可獲得的XP增加
complete_transfer_in_ph_app: 請開啟Pokémon HOME，完成上次的傳送
delete_pokemon_tag_confirmation: 系統將會刪除此標籤，寶可夢不會被傳送給維羅博士。
delete_pokemon_tag_confirmation_title: 確定要刪除「{0}」這個標籤嗎？
disable_sponsored_gift_description: 拜訪道館和寶可補給時，有機會收到附近贊助商提供的禮物和相關廣告訊息。關閉贊助商禮物功能後，附廣告訊息的禮物就不會出現在有提供贊助商禮物的地方。
enable_sponsored_gift_description: 拜訪道館和寶可補給時，有機會收到附近贊助商提供的禮物和相關廣告訊息。開啟贊助商禮物功能後，就可以在有提供贊助商禮物的地方找到附廣告訊息的禮物。
general1.ticket.2_description:
不論你身處世界的何處，你都可以使用這張入場券在當地時間2020年10月17日11:00～17:00領取多邊獸社群日的特殊調查「解火尾童話」。詳情請至遊戲內快訊確認。

請務必在上述活動時間內完成活動指定的課題，以取得活動獎勵。
general1.ticket.2_description_2:
不論你身處世界的何處，你都可以使用這張入場券在當地時間2020年11月21日11:00～17:00領取多邊獸社群日的特殊調查「燃燒吧！鴨嘴火獸！」。詳情請至遊戲內快訊確認。

請務必在上述活動時間內完成活動指定的課題，以取得活動獎勵。
home_cant_obtain_another_warning: 將這隻 {0} 傳送至Pokémon HOME後，你將無法在Pokémon GO裡捕捉到第二隻 {0}。
home_exceeds_max_pokemon: 你所選的寶可夢數量超過了一次可傳送的上限
home_form_revert_warning: 將 {0} 傳送至Pokémon HOME後，牠將會呈現 {1}。
home_invalid_pokemon: 內含無法傳送的寶可夢
home_login_app_modal_body: 請在確認你的Nintendo Account已連結至智慧型手機版的Pokémon HOME後再試一次。
home_pokemon_confirmation: 確定要傳送 {0} 隻寶可夢嗎？
home_privacy_warning: 將Pokémon GO連結至Pokémon HOME時，特定資料將會被傳送至The Pokémon Company。詳情請參閱此協助中心文章。被傳送至The Pokémon Company的資料將依The Pokémon Company之隱私權政策運用。
home_recharge_time_day_hour: 再 {0} 天 {1} 小時才能充飽
home_recharge_time_day_hours: 再 {0} 天 {1} 小時才能充飽
home_recharge_time_days_hour: 再 {0} 天 {1} 小時才能充飽
home_recharge_time_days_hours: 再 {0} 天 {1} 小時才能充飽
home_settings_transfer_warning: 已傳送至Pokémon HOME的寶可夢將無法再次傳送回Pokémon GO
home_support_id_about: 這是目前連結至Pokémon GO的Nintendo Account所使用的Pokémon HOME服務ID。若此服務ID和你所使用的Pokémon HOME服務ID不同，那就代表你在Pokémon GO和Pokémon HOME使用的Nintendo Account不同。請登出後再次以Pokémon HOME的Nintendo Account登入。
home_transfer_error_gym_deployed: 不能傳送已指派至道館的寶可夢
home_transfer_next_steps: 請開啟Pokémon HOME，完成寶可夢的傳送。請注意，在完成本次傳送之前，你將無法把其他寶可夢傳送至Pokémon HOME。
home_transfer_warning: 部分寶可夢傳送至Pokémon HOME後，將無法移動至其他寶可夢系列遊戲。請開啟智慧型手機版Pokémon HOME確認詳情。請注意，寶可夢在傳送至Pokémon HOME後，將無法被送回Pokémon GO。
home_transport_complete: 已成功將寶可夢傳送至Pokémon HOME！
home_transporter_about: 將寶可夢從Pokémon GO傳送至Pokémon HOME時需使用GO傳送裝置的能量。傳送寶可夢所需的能量將依寶可夢而異。
home_transporter_powerup_confirmation: 確定要充飽GO傳送裝置的能量嗎？
invalid_character_tag_name_warning: This name contains an invalid character.
item_event_ticket_pink_desc: 只要擁有這張入場券，不論你身在何處，都能在當地時間10月17日11:00～17:00獲得特殊調查的課題。
item_event_ticket_pink_desc_2: 只要擁有這張入場券，不論你身在何處，都能在當地時間11月21日11:00～17:00獲得特殊調查的課題。
item_event_ticket_pink_details: 入場券將會在當地時間10月17日11:00自動啟用。
item_event_ticket_pink_details_2: 入場券將會自動啟用。不論你身在何處，都可以在當地時間11月21日的活動時間內領取到特殊調查課題。
manage_pokemon_tag_view_all: 查看標有「{0}」標籤的所有寶可夢
mega_candy_plus_energy_walking_desc: 步行距離越遠，夥伴就能找到更多糖果。當你的夥伴心情為「欣喜若狂」時，找到糖果所需的步行距離就會減少。此外，有些夥伴還能為你找到超級能量喔！
mega_energy_cap_stardust_warning: 目前所持有的{0}超級能量接近上限。超過上限的超級能量將會被轉換為星星沙子。
mega_evo_bonus_buff_desc_mult: 在{0}超級進化的期間內，捕捉{1}屬性和{2}屬性的寶可夢或頭目寶可夢時將能獲得額外的糖果。
mega_evo_bonus_buff_desc_singular: 在{0}超級進化的期間內，捕捉{1}屬性的寶可夢或頭目寶可夢時將能獲得額外的糖果。

Patch from: 0.189.0-SHA-c54dec19, 0.191.0-SHA-bacc0237, 0.193.0-SHA-85c4e1f9
nintendo_account_not_linked: 請再次將Nintendo Account連結至Pokémon GO。
photobomb_five_charmander: 小火龍將在GO Snapshot中驚喜現身5次
photobomb_five_electabuzz: 5 surprise encounters with Electabuzz in GO Snapshot
photobomb_five_magmar: 5 surprise encounters with Magmar in GO Snapshot
pokemon_desc_0052_2335: Living with a savage, seafaring people has toughened this Pokémon’s body so much that parts of it have turned to iron.
pokemon_desc_0077_2336: 小小的角裡蘊藏著治癒之力。如果只是一點小傷，牠只要用角輕擦傷口就能治癒。
pokemon_desc_0078_2337: 會從角發射強力的精神利刃。那超群的破壞力甚至可以在厚厚的鐵板上開出洞來。
pokemon_desc_0083_2338: The Farfetch’d of the Galar region are brave warriors, and they wield thick, tough leeks in battle.
pokemon_desc_0562_2344: 刻有詛咒的黏土板附在了哭哭面具上。據說會吸收怨念的能量。
pokemon_desc_0867: 被注入了強烈詛咒的古代繪畫在吸進哭哭面具的靈魂後就開始動起來了。
pokemon_home_about: 你可以使用GO傳送裝置將Pokémon GO裡的寶可夢傳送至Pokémon HOME。傳送寶可夢時需使用登入Pokémon HOME的Nintendo Account。使用GO傳送裝置將寶可夢傳送至Pokémon HOME時將會消耗傳送裝置的能量，而此能量需要花費一些時間才能充飽。請點選此處來確認如何將寶可夢傳送至Pokémon HOME。
pokemon_info_caught_photobomb: 在GO Snapshot驚喜現身後捉到
pokemon_info_caught_quest_stamp: 在達成突破性進展後捉到
pokemon_info_caught_raid_rem: 在遠距VIP超級團體戰中捉到
pokemon_info_caught_raid_rnm: 在遠距超級團體戰中捉到
pokemon_info_evolution_failed: Couldn’t evolve {0} due to an unknown error.
pokemon_info_not_transferable: 所選的寶可夢中有部分不能傳送
pokemon_info_transfer_mega_evo: 不能傳送超級進化的寶可夢
pokemon_inventory_remove_favorites: 確定要將此搜尋條件從常用搜尋中刪除嗎？
pokemon_inventory_too_many_favorites: 可儲存的常用搜尋條件已滿，無法新增。請先刪除先前儲存的常用搜尋條件再嘗試新增。
pokemon_with_tag_count: 標上此標籤的寶可夢：{0} 隻
quest_battle_gbl_plural: Battle in GO Battle League {0} times
quest_catch_berry_any_drifloon: 捕捉飄飄球時使用 {0} 個樹果
quest_catch_berry_nanab_drifloon: 捕捉飄飄球時使用 {0} 個蕉香果
quest_catch_berry_razz_drifloon: 捕捉飄飄球時使用 {0} 個蔓莓果
quest_catch_dark_type_plural: 捕捉 {0} 隻惡屬性的寶可夢
quest_catch_excellent_curve_drifloon: 以Excellent曲球捕捉 {0} 隻飄飄球
quest_catch_excellent_with_berry_drifloo: 先餵食樹果再投出Excellent，捕捉 {0} 隻飄飄球
quest_evolve_dark_type_singular: 讓1隻惡屬性的寶可夢進化
quest_land_curve_type_ghost: 捕捉幽靈屬性寶可夢時投出 {0} 次曲球
quest_land_great_curve_inarow_type_ghost: 捕捉幽靈屬性寶可夢時連續投出 {0} 次Great曲球
quest_land_great_curve_type_ghost: 捕捉幽靈屬性寶可夢時投出 {0} 次Great曲球
quest_land_great_type_ghost: 捕捉幽靈屬性寶可夢時投出 {0} 次Great
quest_land_nice_curve_inarow_type_ghost: 捕捉幽靈屬性寶可夢時連續投出 {0} 次Nice曲球
quest_land_nice_curve_type_ghost: 捕捉幽靈屬性寶可夢時投出 {0} 次Nice曲球
quest_land_nice_type_ghost: 捕捉幽靈屬性寶可夢時投出 {0} 次Nice
quest_rockethq1_leaders_win_plural: 在與GO火箭隊幹部的對戰中獲勝 {0} 次
quest_special_dialogue_chart_0_0: 嘿，%PLAYERNAME%，你最近好嗎？我最近仍然是天天埋頭做研究，不過做研究的空檔時間也會帶夥伴寶可夢去散散步。
quest_special_dialogue_chart_0_1: 我今天早上帶夥伴去散步的時候，聽到一陣劈哩啪啦的聲音。
quest_special_dialogue_chart_0_2: 我研究了一下，發現那劈哩啪啦的聲音來自一大群小火龍。
quest_special_dialogue_chart_0_3: 我們很少有機會能見到這麼大一群小火龍，不過這也不是第一次……
quest_special_dialogue_chart_0_4: 不管怎麼說，這可是個研究小火龍的絕佳機會！
quest_special_dialogue_chart_0_5: 可以請你先幫我捉幾隻小火龍回來嗎？
quest_special_dialogue_chart_1_1: 你在外面捉小火龍的時候，我也針對牠和牠的進化形態做了一些研究。
quest_special_dialogue_chart_1_2: 小火龍被分類為蜥蜴寶可夢，而且牠天生喜歡熱熱的東西。只要看看牠尾巴上的火焰，就能知道牠目前的心情如何。
quest_special_dialogue_chart_1_3: 唔……也許那群小火龍是出來做日光浴？我們得讓牠進化，然後做進一步研究。
quest_special_dialogue_chart_1_4: 小火龍的進化形態是火恐龍。火恐龍是一隻性情粗暴的寶可夢，你得小心點。
quest_special_dialogue_chart_2_0: 看來你成功讓小火龍進化成火恐龍了呢！
quest_special_dialogue_chart_2_1: 據說火焰寶可夢火恐龍一直在尋找戰鬥的對手，性情非常粗暴。
quest_special_dialogue_chart_2_2: 在與強敵戰鬥的過程中，如果情緒變得興奮起來，有時還會噴出藍白色的火焰呢。
quest_special_dialogue_chart_2_3: 據說要讓牠冷靜下來的最好方法，就是在對戰中把牠打倒。……唔，這怎麼跟我認識的某個隊長一樣？
quest_special_dialogue_chart_2_4: 接下來我們要試著讓火恐龍進化成噴火龍。噴火龍也是一隻值得好好研究的寶可夢呢！
quest_special_dialogue_chart_3_0: 看來你成功讓火恐龍進化成火焰寶可夢噴火龍了呢！
quest_special_dialogue_chart_3_1: 聽說噴火龍能用翅膀飛到距離地面1400公尺的高度，而且還會吐出高溫的火焰。
quest_special_dialogue_chart_3_2: 然而在面對比自己弱小的對手時，牠絕對不會吐出那可熔化一切的高溫火焰。
quest_special_dialogue_chart_3_3: 牠的自制力真是太強了！看來牠只會與牠勢均力敵的寶可夢對戰呢。
quest_special_dialogue_chart_3_4: 如果你想和噴火龍培養感情，那將牠設為夥伴是最好的方法。多花點時間陪陪牠吧。
quest_special_dialogue_chart_4_0: %PLAYERNAME%，你和噴火龍的搭檔真是太棒了！我想你們之間的羈絆，一定能化做一股強大的力量。
quest_special_dialogue_chart_4_1: 你知道我想說什麼對吧？沒錯，就是超級進化。噴火龍特別的地方就在於牠不只能超級進化，而且牠還擁有兩種超級進化形態。
quest_special_dialogue_chart_4_2: 超級噴火龍Ｘ和超級噴火龍Ｙ不僅外表不同，就連擁有的能力也不一樣。
quest_special_dialogue_chart_4_3: 據說超級噴火龍Ｘ全身上下湧出的力量超乎尋常，不只會將身體染成黑色，而且還會同時熊熊燃燒起藍色的火焰。
quest_special_dialogue_chart_4_4: 另一方面，對超級噴火龍Ｙ來說，與訓練家的牽絆是牠力量的泉源，牠引以為傲的飛行能力甚至凌駕於噴射機之上。
quest_special_dialogue_chart_4_5: 真是太神奇了！我等不及要看看訓練家們在對戰時使用超級進化寶可夢的英姿了！
quest_special_dialogue_chart_4_6: %PLAYERNAME%，這次也很感謝你的幫忙，下次再一起做研究吧！
quest_special_dialogue_elect_0_0: Hey there, %PLAYERNAME%! I’m really glad to see you.
quest_special_dialogue_elect_0_1: I’ve been dealing with some strange power outages in my mobile lab and wanted to investigate what could be causing them.
quest_special_dialogue_elect_0_2: It didn’t take me long to find the cause. Seems as though a group of Electabuzz decided that the mobile lab’s electricity would make an excellent snack.
quest_special_dialogue_elect_0_3: Electabuzz seem to be appearing in higher numbers, which could lead to more outages.
quest_special_dialogue_elect_0_4: Do you think you could catch some of these Pokémon?
quest_special_dialogue_elect_0_5: The research would be valuable, and I’d be grateful to have my power restored!
quest_special_dialogue_elect_1_1: Thanks for the assistance—I really appreciate it! While you were out catching Electabuzz, I did some research on this Pokémon’s Evolutionary line.
quest_special_dialogue_elect_1_2: Did you know that Electabuzz evolves from Elekid?
quest_special_dialogue_elect_1_3: A weak electric current flows between Elekid’s horns. Be careful, Trainer! Sticking a hand between its horns will shock you!
quest_special_dialogue_elect_1_4: Hmm... I wonder whether Spark has tried that with his Buddy Pokémon...
quest_special_dialogue_elect_1_5: Anyway, let’s keep researching these Electabuzz and make sure they aren’t snacking on any electricity meant for other uses!
quest_special_dialogue_elect_2_0: Great work, %PLAYERNAME%. I think we have enough data on Electabuzz.
quest_special_dialogue_elect_2_1: Also known as the Electric Pokémon, it loves to feed on strong electricity. That explains why so many Electabuzz were attracted to my mobile lab.
quest_special_dialogue_elect_2_2: Electricity runs across the surface of Electabuzz’s body. In darkness, its entire body glows a whitish blue.
quest_special_dialogue_elect_2_3: Simply amazing! Let’s continue our research. Go ahead and use a Sinnoh Stone to evolve Electabuzz into Electivire!
quest_special_dialogue_elect_2_4: I can’t wait to see what electrifying facts we’ll learn about that Evolution!
quest_special_dialogue_elect_3_0: I just don’t ever know whether they find my jokes funny... Should I take a comedy class?
quest_special_dialogue_elect_3_1: OH! I didn’t see you there, %PLAYERNAME%. I see you’ve evolved your Electabuzz into Electivire like I asked. Thank you!
quest_special_dialogue_elect_3_2: According to the Pokédex, as Electivire’s electric charge amplifies, blue sparks begin to crackle between its horns.
quest_special_dialogue_elect_3_3: When in battle, Electivire pushes the tips of its two tails against its foe, then lets loose with over 20,000 volts of power. I guess you could say its opponent is in for a shock!
quest_special_dialogue_elect_3_4: Be careful with this Pokémon when battling with it—that’s a lot of power you’re dealing with!
quest_special_dialogue_elect_3_5: With the lights back on in the mobile lab, I’m going to head back and wrap up some other projects.
quest_special_dialogue_elect_3_6: Thank you again for all your help, and until next time, let’s GO!
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_0_1: 哈哈哈，你有沒有被我嚇到啊？這個季節就是適合嚇人嘛。
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_0_2: 是說既然你都來了，我想請你幫我調查一下最近在這附近森林裡出沒的寶可夢。
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_0_3: 你問我為什麼不自己去找那隻寶可夢？欵，那個，你知道那片森林烏漆抹黑的……絕、絕對不是因為我會怕喔！
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_0_4: 是、是說你也知、知道我很忙……對，我忙著做研究！
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_0_5: 噢！是說布蘭雪他就在附近呢。我要來研究幽靈屬性寶可夢的進化過程。
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_0_6: 那調查森林的事就交給你了，%PLAYERNAME%！祝你好運！
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_1_0: 布蘭雪，你確定這隻伽勒爾的樣子的寶可夢能進化？噢，是%PLAYERNAME%回來啦，辛苦你了！
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_1_1: 那是什麼聲音！？噢，原來是隻哭哭面具啊。牠看起來像是在哭呢。
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_1_2: 你說你在森林裡遇見了哭哭面具？看來我得請你再去一趟森林裡了……
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_1_3: 我比較了一下目擊情報和我手上這份關於幽靈屬性寶可夢的資料，發現我要找的不是這種哭哭面具，
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_1_4: 而是來自伽勒爾地區的哭哭面具。據說刻有詛咒的黏土板附在了哭哭面具上，而且牠還會吸收怨念的能量呢。
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_1_5: 很抱歉，這次我也不能陪你一起去，畢竟那個……呃……對！史帕克說要我幫他研究怪蛋！等會見囉！
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_2_0: 看來怪蛋能孵出來的大多是毒屬性和惡屬性的寶可夢……很好，我早就知道這件事了……呃不是啦！
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_2_1: %PLAYERNAME%，歡迎回來！哭哭面具牠……天啊，是花岩怪！
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_2_2: 我前兩年也有調查過花岩怪，你以前有捉過牠嗎？
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_2_3: 花岩怪是108個靈魂聚集在一起誕生出的寶可夢，據說牠被鎖在楔石的裂縫裡。
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_2_4: 這個季節總是怪事特別多！
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_2_5: 話又說回來，我需要麻煩你再跑一趟那座森林。我們這次一定能找到來自伽勒爾的哭哭面具！
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_2_6: 嗯、那個、我……我要去幫坎迪拉準備接下來的訓練家對戰，你路上小心喔！
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_3_0: 毒屬性、蟲屬性、幽靈屬性、惡屬性和妖精屬性……坎迪拉，妳準備得真是周全！
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_3_1: %PLAYERNAME%，你回來啦！看來你找到伽勒爾的哭哭面具了呢！牠跟其他的哭哭面具長得完全不一樣。
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_3_2: 布蘭雪跟我研究了一下幽靈屬性寶可夢的進化，發現伽勒爾哭哭面具跟合眾哭哭面具進化後的樣子完全不一樣。
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_3_3: 你趕快去多收集些哭哭面具的糖果，讓牠進化吧。要把寶可夢登錄進圖鑑，才算是真正完成研究。
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_3_4: 這次的伽勒爾哭哭面具調查真是有趣。
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_3_5: 希望你盡情享受秋高氣爽的好天氣，千萬別被妖魔鬼怪嚇跑了啊！
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_0_0: Hello, %PLAYERNAME%! Is it just me, or is a little warm here? It’s quite odd, because I was just on a walk when my surroundings became incredibly warm!
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_0_1: I noticed there was this clearing nearby with a nice cool breeze blowing through so I came here to cool off from the sudden warmth—but then the warmth seemed to have followed me here!
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_0_2: Curious, isn’t it? I wonder if this is the work of a Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_0_3: There’s one known to move frequently in hot areas and if they’re in cold areas then they’ll blow scorching flames to heat up their surroundings.
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_0_4: Regardless of whether you live in an area that’s cold or hot this time of year, I believe there are swarms of this particular Pokémon appearing more often right now.
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_0_5: I won't tell you what I'm thinking though! I'll write it on this piece of paper and when you come back, you can check to see if my guess was right!
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_0_6: Can you go investigate and let me know what you find?
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_1_1: Ohoho! If you take a look at THIS paper here, you'll see that I had written down...Magmar!
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_1_2: As the kids say, my guess was on fire—AH! Wow, that little fireball was hot, it burned the paper with my guess on it to a crisp!
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_1_3: Turns out, the Pokémon to blame for making this lovely cool area warm was indeed Magmar, the Spitfire Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_1_4: When it breathes deeply, heat waves form around its body, making it hard to see clearly—isn’t that just incredible?
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_1_5: And to think that this incredibly intimidating Pokémon evolves from the adorable Magby, the Live Coal Pokémon!
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_1_6: Though, field studies of this Pokémon have shown that it each and every time it inhales and exhales, hot embers dribble out of its mouth and nostrils. Doesn’t stop me from trying to hug it though!
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_1_7: Anyway, %PLAYERNAME%, we’ll need to work towards evolving your Magmar!
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_2_1: Soon, you’ll have raised yourself a Magmortar, the Blast Pokémon. But watch out for the ends of their arms!
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_2_2: According to the Pokédex, it can blast fireballs as hot as 3,600 degrees F out of them. Can you imagine if you could blast fireballs out of the ends of your arms?
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_2_3: Pow! Pow! Pow! That would be quite fun, don’t you say? Pow!
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_2_4: Ah, I’m getting so fired up, I lost track of my train of thought. Get it—fired up? Ha ha ha.
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_2_5: Anyway, with this Sinnoh Stone and the Magmar Candy you’ve acquired, you should soon be able to evolve it into a Magmortar, so keep on chugging on, %PLAYERNAME%!
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_3_0: Scorching good work, %PLAYERNAME%! Looks like you’ve evolved and raised your very own Blast Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_3_1: Magmortar, like Magby and Magmar, tend to live in volcanos.
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_3_2: Its body can even take on a whitish hue from the intense heat generated from shooting their 3,600 degrees F fireballs from the ends of their arms!
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_3_3: Wow, learning about Magmar and its Evolution line has lit a fire in my heart. I think I’m going to go do some more field research with this newfound energy!
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_3_4: With that, I’m off. See you around, %PLAYERNAME%, and until then—let’s GO!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_0_1: 我想你應該也知道……GO火箭隊又跑出來搗亂了！
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_0_2: 我聽說他們在寶可補給站鬼鬼祟祟地不知道在做什麼，可以請你去調查一下嗎？
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_0_3: 我想知道他們到底在打什麼鬼主意。
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_1_0: %PLAYERNAME%，幹得好！不過看來這些手下並不知道GO火箭隊的高層到底在打什麼鬼主意。
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_1_1: 你也知道這些手下所用的暗影寶可夢是用不自然的方法強化的。
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_1_2: 我聽說亞洛是負責強化暗影寶可夢的人。據說這是他和坎迪拉對立並離開武勇隊的理由。
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_1_3: 而且史帕克他最近也提到GO火箭隊似乎是把歪腦筋動到了蛋上面……不知道亞洛是不是也有參與其中？
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_1_4: 請你盡量多調查一些寶可補給站，並淨化暗影寶可夢，
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_2_0: %PLAYERNAME%，感謝你拯救了這麼多暗影寶可夢！
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_2_1: 我發現你捉到了一隻幼基拉斯！野生的幼基拉斯很罕見，難不成牠來自GO火箭隊正在收集的蛋……？
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_2_2: 你在外面打倒GO火箭隊的時候，我跟隊長們發現GO火箭隊正在收集一種奇妙的蛋。
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_2_3: 我把那種蛋稱做是「怪蛋」，而怪蛋能孵出的大多是毒屬性和惡屬性的寶可夢。
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_2_4: 也就是說，只要我們也去收集怪蛋，或許就能抑止GO火箭隊的勢力！記得出門時多帶上幾個孵化器！
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_3_0: %PLAYERNAME%，謝謝你拯救了這麼多寶可夢！而且裡面還有好幾隻很可愛呢。
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_3_1: 當你在外面奮戰的時候，我跟史帕克也去做了一些調查，發現希爾拉可能就是怪蛋的幕後黑手！
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_3_2: 我原本以為GO火箭隊的幹部只負責占領寶可補給站和挑戰訓練家，沒想到他們連這些壞事也幹。
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_3_3: 先是亞洛開發出暗影寶可夢，然後希爾拉用弄出了個怪蛋……這些GO火箭隊的傢伙到底還想做什麼壞事？
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_3_4: %PLAYERNAME%，你知道我想說什麼吧？我們絕對不能放任他們在外面為非作歹。
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_4_0: 這真是太驚人了，%PLAYERNAME%！看來這多少能讓他們安份一下了。
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_4_1: 我做了一台新的超級火箭隊雷達，你就拿它去追蹤阪木吧。不過你千萬要小心……布蘭雪和坎迪拉跟我說他手上有暗影超夢！
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_4_2: 以前阪木也曾帶著暗影超夢出現，但我做夢也沒想到他會捲土重來！
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_4_3: 請你務必救出暗影超夢，別讓牠被阪木拿去做壞事！
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_5_0: %PLAYERNAME%，幹得好！你又再次打敗了GO火箭隊的手下、幹部和阪木！
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_5_1: 而且你還拯救了暗影超夢和這麼多暗影寶可夢！
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_5_2: 這或許不會是我們最後一次見到阪木和GO火箭隊，所以請你務必保持戒心，繼續拯救暗影寶可夢和收集怪蛋。
